videos.title: Car Alternator Windmill for Off-Grid Power
videos.description: Learn how to repurpose a car alternator to create a robust windmill for generating off-grid electricity.
steps: Modify the alternator for low RPM operation
Construct the windmill frame using PVC pipes
Install the tail vane for directional control
Set up the electrical system with charge controller and battery

Connect the system to your home's water supply
